遺伝子の対応関係表
```{r}
paste("Gene_name", 
      "Hs.Gene_name.homology_type.Tabula_sapiens.not_uniq_relation.manual_curate.txt",
      sep = "/") %>%
  read_tsv(show_col_types = FALSE) -> Hs_homology
paste("Gene_name",
      "Mm.Gene_name.homology_type.Tabula_muris.not_uniq_relation.txt",
      sep = "/") %>%
  read_tsv(show_col_types = FALSE) -> Mm_homology

Hs_homology %>%
  dplyr::count(Mouse_homology_type.x) %>%
  mutate(customclassif = "All_gene")-> Hs_all_genes
Mm_homology %>%
  dplyr::count(Human_homology_type.x) %>%
  mutate(customclassif = "All_gene")-> Mm_all_genes
```

Seurat解析データの読み込み
```{r}
for(organ in c("Liver", "Kidney", "Lung", "Pancreas", "Thymus")){
  paste(curdir, "/", organ,"/RDS/Hs_", organ, "picked.rds", sep = "") %>%
    readRDS() -> Hs_seurat.picked
  
  # sctypeでラベル
  Hs_seurat.picked <- run_sctype(Hs_seurat.picked, organ)
#  paste(curdir, "/", organ,"/RDS/Hs_", organ, "picked.sctype.rds", sep = "") %>%
#    saveRDS(object = Hs_seurat.picked, file = .)
  
  # クラスターラベルIDと細胞腫名を結合
  Hs_seurat.picked@meta.data %>%
    dplyr::select(c("integrated_seurat_cluster", "customclassif")) %>%
    distinct %>%
    transform(integrated_seurat_cluster =
                as.numeric(integrated_seurat_cluster) - 1) -> Hs_seurat_picked.meta.data
  
  # マーカー遺伝子数を対応関係ごとに合計
  # ヒト
  Hs_marker_count <- extract_Hs_count_gene(organ)
  # マウス
  Mm_marker_count <- extract_Mm_count_gene(organ)
  
  # ヒトとマウスを結合
  bind_rows(Hs_marker_count, Mm_marker_count) %>% 
    inner_join(Hs_seurat_picked.meta.data,
               by = c("cluster" = "integrated_seurat_cluster")) -> Hs_Mm_marker_count
  
  # 遺伝子数をプロット
  Hs_Mm_marker_count %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = ratio, y = homology_type, fill = homology_type)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
    geom_text(aes(label = n.x), hjust = -0.3) +
    facet_grid(SP ~ reorder(customclassif, cluster)) +
    theme_bw() +
    scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 1.3)) +
    NoLegend() -> p1
  width_plot <- bind_rows(Hs_all_count, Mm_all_count) %>%
    select(cluster) %>%
    distinct %>%
    dim
  ggsave(paste(organ, "/Marker_gene/Hs_Mm_", organ,
               "_seurat_integrated.celltype_marker_count.png", sep = ""),
         p1, width = 1 + 2 * width_plot[1])
  
  # 表を出力
  Hs_Mm_marker_count %>%
    mutate(SP_cell = paste(SP, customclassif, sep ="_")) %>%
    group_by(SP_cell) %>%
    dplyr::select(c("homology_type", "n.x", "SP_cell")) %>%
    pivot_wider(names_from = SP_cell,
                values_from = n.x, values_fill = 0) %>%
    write.table(file = paste(organ, "/Marker_gene/Hs_Mm_", organ,
                             "_seurat_integrated.celltype_marker_count.tsv", sep = ""),
              quote = F, row.names = F, sep = "\t")
  # 表を出力
  Hs_Mm_marker_count %>%
    mutate(SP_cell = paste(SP, customclassif, sep ="_")) %>%
    group_by(SP_cell) %>%
    mutate(ratio = round(ratio, digits = 3)) %>%
    dplyr::select(c("homology_type", "ratio", "SP_cell")) %>%
    pivot_wider(names_from = SP_cell,
                values_from = ratio, values_fill = 0) %>%
    write.table(file = paste(organ, "/Marker_gene/Hs_Mm_", organ,
                             "_seurat_integrated.celltype_marker_ratio.tsv", sep = ""),
              quote = F, row.names = F, sep = "\t")
}
```
